A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I never thought a Star Wars movie could be reprehensible. But this is how far Hollywood have gone. Not because the script is ridiculously lousy. But because the entire film is completely engulfed in SJW/feminist propaganda. All classic Star Wars themes are sacrificed for the idiology. Now I know how german people must have felt like when they saw propagandamovies in nazi germany in the 1930ies.
